sentences.en: Bananas and sugar are the staples of Jamaica.
sentences.cn: 香蕉和糖是牙买加的主要产品。

sentences.en: Cereals form the staple diet of an enormous number of people around the world.
sentences.cn: 谷类是世界范围内很大一部分人的主要食物。

sentences.en: Coffee is the staple of this district.
sentences.cn: 咖啡是这个地区的主要产品.

sentences.en: Cotton is the staple of the area.
sentences.cn: 棉花是这个地区的主要农作物.

sentences.en: It is well known that bamboo shoots are a panda's staple diet.
sentences.cn: 竹笋是熊猫的主要食物，这是人所共知的。

sentences.en: Most staple fibers are discrete, individual entities.
sentences.cn: 大多数短纤维是不联系的单独实体.
石油是尼日利亚的主要出口产品。

sentences.en: One or two staple crops are the chief sources of food intake.
sentences.cn: 一、两种主要农作物是人们食物的主要来源.

sentences.en: Rice is the staple food of more than half the world's population.
sentences.cn: 稻米是全世界一半以上人口的主食。

sentences.en: Staple some sheets of paper together into a book.
sentences.cn: 用订书机将几页纸装订成册。

sentences.en: Tea is the staple crop here.
sentences.cn: 本地产品以茶叶为大宗.

sentences.en: The Chinese also eat a type of pasta as part of their staple diet.
sentences.cn: 中国人也把一种面食作为他们的主食之一。

sentences.en: They should not be the staple of diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 它们不应成为外交上的常规.

sentences.en: This differentiates them from discontinuous, short, or staple fibres.
sentences.cn: 这就把它们与不连续的 、 短的或定长的纤维区别开来.

sentences.en: We'll have to staple synthetic fibre this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午咱们得把合成纤维分分档.

words.tran_cn: [轻] 订书机；主要商品批发商；把羊毛分级的人
主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的
[贸易]主要产品；[轻]订书钉；主题

phrases.tran_cn: 长纤维；长绒棉纤维；毛系短纤维
纤维长度；纤维定长；手扯长度

trans.tran_en: forming the greatest or most important part of something

trans.tran_cn: 主要产品，钉书钉，U 形钉，主题，主要部份，主食
trans.tran_en: a small piece of thin wire that is pushed into sheets of paper and bent over to hold them together
to fasten two or more things together with a staple
